title: Naruto
description: Follow the journey of Naruto Uzumaki
fullDescription: Naruto Uzumaki dreams of becoming Hokage, the strongest ninja leader in his village. Watch his growth through hardship, friendship, and epic battles.

title: Attack on Titan
description: The fight against the titans begins
fullDescription: Eren Yeager joins the Scout Regiment to fight giant man-eating titans threatening humanity’s survival behind walled cities.

title: One Piece
description: Join Luffy on his quest for the One Piece
fullDescription: Monkey D. Luffy sails across dangerous seas with his crew to find the legendary treasure called One Piece and become the Pirate King.

title: Demon Slayer
description: Tanjiro Kamado battles demons to save his sister
fullDescription: After a demon attack kills his family, Tanjiro joins the Demon Slayer Corps to protect others and find a cure for his demon-turned sister Nezuko.

title: Mob Psycho 100
fullDescription: Mob, a shy teen with immense psychic powers, tries to live a normal life and control his emotions while dealing with spirits and rival espers.

title: Spirited Away
description: A magical journey into a mysterious world
fullDescription: Chihiro wanders into a spiritual world and must work in a bathhouse to free her parents and return home. A Studio Ghibli masterpiece.

title: Your Name
description: A tale of two strangers whose lives are linked
fullDescription: Taki and Mitsuha wake up in each other’s bodies across time and space. A breathtaking story of love and fate.

title: Grave of the Fireflies
description: A haunting tale of war and loss
fullDescription: A young boy and his sister struggle to survive in WWII Japan. A deeply emotional story about the toll of war on innocent lives.

title: Howl's Moving Castle
description: A mysterious castle, a cursed girl, and a heartwarming tale
fullDescription: Sophie is cursed to become an old woman and seeks help from the mysterious wizard Howl who lives in a magical moving castle.

title: Hunter x Hunter (1999)
description: A young boy becomes a Hunter like his father
fullDescription: Gon Freecss journeys to find his father and become a Hunter, facing dangerous trials and forming unbreakable friendships.

title: Bleach
description: A teenager becomes a Soul Reaper
fullDescription: Ichigo Kurosaki gains the power of a Soul Reaper and defends the world from evil spirits while uncovering secrets of the soul society.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: Space bounty hunters chase danger and their pasts
fullDescription: In a futuristic space setting, a crew of bounty hunters called the Bebop take on missions while confronting their emotional pasts.
